content: HDMB 10 core bit Diamond core bit for hand-held drilling machines ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Convenient starting aid Hand-held coring Applications Dry coring in abrasive brick and concrete block only (with no dust control) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Core bit diameters are nominal, for actual diameter please contact Hilti Customer Service For use with: DD 110-D, DD 150-U Base materials: Masonry Technical Data | For use with | DD 110-D, DD 150-U | Base materials | Masonry | Drilling Mode | Hand-held | Wet or dry operation | Dry | Change module | No | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BT (5/8 in) | Product Class | Standard | Working length | 10 in | Segment height | 8 mm ### ITEMS- 244989 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 1 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 244993 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 1-1/4 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 244999 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 1-5/8 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245021 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 2 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245023 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 2-1/2 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245024 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 3 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245026 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 3-1/2 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245046 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 4 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245047 - Dry slttd core bit DD-BT 5 x 10 S HDMB - Package Size 1 pc - 245048 - DD-BT dry slotted HDMB core bit 6/10 S - Package Size 1 pc
